Hi everyone, I'm Bitsy from The Frugalicious Show and this is Bitsy's quick tips.
Save money by not paying credit card fees.
Pay off your balance every month, or better yet, make your credit cards work for you.
The landscape for credit cards with rewards programs is getting more and more competitive...
...and it's easier than ever to get something for the money you're spending.
So check out creditcards.com to compare and contrast different rewards programs...
...and make your credit cards work for you.
